items.sentence: Tom quietly opened the door and looked into the room.
A lot of girls think that Tom is really good-looking.
Can you help me get that box down from the top shelf?
Can you send me the pictures that you took yesterday?
What\'s the difference between an emu and an ostrich?
One of the security guards is checking the rooms now.
Do you want me to say that I won\'t keep seeing Mary?
If you run into Tom, ask him how his mother is doing.
I know that we can\'t count on Tom to do that for us.
What were you guys doing while Tom was chopping wood?
Are we still going to go over to Tom\'s after school?
Are you sure this is the place we\'re supposed to be?
I don\'t think we\'re going to make it to your party.
We spent all day searching for a way out of the cave.
What\'s the one thing you would\'ve done differently?
What\'s the real reason Tom didn\'t want to buy that?
What\'s the stupidest thing you\'ve ever seen Tom do?
When do you think you\'re going to finish doing that?
No one noticed that the picture was hung upside down.
When was the last time you went to an amusement park?
